Text: Much thanks, looking forward to reading this. Great job!

It's called "Transformers" and is from IDW recently, The two series currently in publication are "robots in disguise" and "more than meets the eye" which i do not need. It has a run of i think 35 issues or somewhere around that ballpark. 

Sorry for not being specific enough earlier, If this still isn't enough i'll try and find more info! 

Thanks for at least trying! :)
